channel.title: AppleScript on Jim Mitchell
channel.description: Recent content in AppleScript on Jim Mitchell

item.title: Better Applescript Compress Files or Folders
item.description: I created an AppleScript that allows you to compress files and folders by simply dropping them onto the applet. A reader asked for a way to archive files and folders based off that post. This was my solution.

item.title: Applescript to Compress Files and Folders
item.description: This Applescript compresses files and folders into their own archive.

item.title: AppleScript to Add Files in the Mac Finder
item.description: I had the need to add several named text files to a project folder in the Finder on my Mac today. This is the AppleScript I developed to solve it.

item.title: Applescript to Toggle the Desktop
item.description: An AppleScript I use to quickly toggle desktop visibility for taking screenshots and recording screencasts that I thought might be useful for others.
